nodes.id: 中国共产党广州市委员会

zh-cn: 中国共产党广州市委员会

description.zh-cn: 中国共产党在广东省广州市的组织和领导机关，成立于1927年4月27日。
description.en: The organization and leadership body of the Communist Party of China in Guangzhou, Guangdong Province, established on April 27, 1927.

description.zh-cn: 中国政治人物，现任中共广州市委书记。
description.en: Chinese politician, currently serving as the Party Secretary of Guangzhou.

nodes.id: 中国共产党广东省委员会

zh-cn: 中国共产党广东省委员会

description.zh-cn: 中国共产党在广东省的领导机关。
description.en: The leadership body of the Communist Party of China in Guangdong Province.

description.zh-cn: 中国政治人物，现任中共广州市委副书记、广州市市长。
description.en: Chinese politician, currently serving as the Deputy Party Secretary of Guangzhou and Mayor of Guangzhou.

description.zh-cn: 中华人民共和国广东省广州市的地方国家行政机关。
description.en: The local state administrative organ of Guangzhou City, Guangdong Province, People's Republic of China.

description.zh-cn: 中国政治人物，现任中共广州市委副书记。
description.en: Chinese politician, currently serving as the Deputy Party Secretary of Guangzhou.

description.zh-cn: 中国政治人物，现任中共广州市委常委、组织部部长。
description.en: Chinese politician, currently serving as a member of the Standing Committee and Director of the Organization Department of the CCP Guangzhou Municipal Committee.

nodes.id: 中国共产党中央委员会

zh-cn: 中国共产党中央委员会
en: Central Committee of the Communist Party of China

description.zh-cn: 中国共产党的中央领导机构。
description.en: The central leadership body of the Communist Party of China.

description.zh-cn: 中华人民共和国的特别行政区。
description.en: A special administrative region of the People's Republic of China.

description.zh-cn: 中国共产党早期成员，曾任中共广州市委书记。
description.en: An early member of the Communist Party of China, served as the Party Secretary of Guangzhou.

description.zh-cn: 中国共产党早期成员，曾任中共广州市委委员。
description.en: An early member of the Communist Party of China, served as a member of the CCP Guangzhou Municipal Committee.

description.zh-cn: 中华人民共和国的武装力量。
description.en: The armed forces of the People's Republic of China.

description.zh-cn: 1949年中国人民解放军攻占广州市的军事行动。
description.en: The military operation in 1949 by the People's Liberation Army to capture the city of Guangzhou.

description.zh-cn: 中国共产党广州市委员会负责组织工作的职能部门。
description.en: The functional department of the CCP Guangzhou Municipal Committee responsible for organization work.

description.zh-cn: 中国共产党广州市委员会直属的事业单位。
description.en: A public institution directly under the CCP Guangzhou Municipal Committee.

description.zh-cn: 中国政治人物，曾任中共广州市委书记。
description.en: Chinese politician, served as the Party Secretary of Guangzhou.

description.zh-cn: 中国政治人物，曾志的丈夫。
description.en: Chinese politician, husband of Zeng Zhi.

description.zh-cn: 中国政治家和军事家，中华人民共和国元帅，曾任中共广州市委第一书记。
description.en: Chinese politician and military leader, Marshal of the People's Republic of China, served as the First Party Secretary of Guangzhou.

description.zh-cn: 中国政治家，曾任中华人民共和国主席和中共广州市委书记。
description.en: Chinese politician, served as President of the People's Republic of China and Party Secretary of Guangzhou.

description.zh-cn: 中国政治人物，曾任中共广州市委书记和中共广东省委书记。
description.en: Chinese politician, served as the Party Secretary of Guangzhou and Party Secretary of Guangdong Province.

description.zh-cn: 中国前政治人物，曾任中共广州市委书记。
description.en: Former Chinese politician, served as the Party Secretary of Guangzhou.

relationships.source: 中国共产党广州市委员会
relationships.target: 中国共产党广东省委员会

description.zh-cn: 中国共产党广州市委员会是中国共产党广东省委员会的下级机构，并向其报告工作。
description.en: The CCP Guangzhou Municipal Committee is a subordinate body of the CCP Guangdong Provincial Committee and reports its work to it.

relationships.source: 中国共产党广州市委员会
relationships.target: 中国共产党中央委员会

description.zh-cn: 中国共产党广州市委员会执行中国共产党中央委员会的指示。
description.en: The CCP Guangzhou Municipal Committee carries out the instructions of the Central Committee of the Communist Party of China.

relationships.target: 中国共产党广州市委员会

description.zh-cn: 郭永航自2023年6月起担任中共广州市委书记。
description.en: Guo Yonghang has served as the Party Secretary of Guangzhou since June 2023.

relationships.target: 中国共产党广东省委员会

description.zh-cn: 郭永航兼任中共广东省委常委。
description.en: Guo Yonghang concurrently serves as a member of the Standing Committee of the CCP Guangdong Provincial Committee.

relationships.target: 中国共产党广州市委员会

description.zh-cn: 孙志洋是中共广州市第十二届委员会委员，担任副书记。
description.en: Sun Zhiyang is a member of the 12th CCP Guangzhou Municipal Committee, serving as Deputy Secretary.

relationships.target: 广州市人民政府

description.zh-cn: 孙志洋担任广州市市长。
description.en: Sun Zhiyang serves as the Mayor of Guangzhou.

relationships.target: 中国共产党广州市委员会

description.zh-cn: 陈向新是中共广州市第十二届委员会委员，担任副书记。
description.en: Chen Xiangxin is a member of the 12th CCP Guangzhou Municipal Committee, serving as Deputy Secretary.

relationships.target: 中国共产党广州市委员会

position.en: Standing Committee Member, Director of the Organization Department

description.zh-cn: 廉奕是中共广州市第十二届委员会委员，担任常委、组织部部长。
description.en: Lian Yi is a member of the 12th CCP Guangzhou Municipal Committee, serving as a Standing Committee Member and Director of the Organization Department.

relationships.target: 中国共产党广州市委员会

description.zh-cn: 1927年4月27日，中共广州市委在香港成立，吴毅任市委书记。
description.en: On April 27, 1927, the CCP Guangzhou Municipal Committee was established in Hong Kong, and Wu Yi served as its secretary.

relationships.target: 中国共产党广州市委员会

description.zh-cn: 1928年1月上旬，中共广州市委重新成立，季步高为市委委员。
description.en: In early January 1928, the CCP Guangzhou Municipal Committee was re-established, and Ji Bugao became a member of the municipal committee.

relationships.target: 中国共产党广州市委员会

description.zh-cn: 中国人民解放军攻占广州后，中共广州市委得以重建。
description.en: After the People's Liberation Army captured Guangzhou, the CCP Guangzhou Municipal Committee was re-established.

relationships.target: 广州战斗 (1949年)

description.zh-cn: 中国人民解放军发动了广州战斗并攻占该市。
description.en: The People's Liberation Army launched the Guangzhou Campaign and captured the city.

relationships.target: 中国共产党广州市委员会

description.zh-cn: 中共广州市委组织部是中共广州市委的职能部门。
description.en: The Organization Department of the CCP Guangzhou Municipal Committee is a functional department of the CCP Guangzhou Municipal Committee.

relationships.target: 中国共产党广州市委员会

description.zh-cn: 广州日报报业集团是中共广州市委的直属事业单位。
description.en: Guangzhou Daily Press Group is a public institution directly affiliated with the CCP Guangzhou Municipal Committee.

relationships.target: 陶铸

description.zh-cn: 曾志是陶铸的夫人。
description.en: Zeng Zhi was the wife of Tao Zhu.

relationships.target: 中国共产党广州市委员会

description.zh-cn: 曾志曾任中共广州市委书记。
description.en: Zeng Zhi served as the Party Secretary of Guangzhou.

relationships.target: 中国共产党广州市委员会

description.zh-cn: 叶剑英于1949年10月至1952年12月间担任中共广州市委第一书记。
description.en: Ye Jianying served as the First Party Secretary of Guangzhou from October 1949 to December 1952.

relationships.target: 中国共产党广州市委员会

description.zh-cn: 杨尚昆于1979年3月至1980年11月间担任中共广州市委书记。
description.en: Yang Shangkun served as the Party Secretary of Guangzhou from March 1979 to November 1980.

relationships.target: 中国共产党广州市委员会

description.zh-cn: 谢非于1986年11月至1988年5月间担任中共广州市委书记。
description.en: Xie Fei served as the Party Secretary of Guangzhou from November 1986 to May 1988.

relationships.target: 中国共产党广州市委员会

description.zh-cn: 万庆良于2011年12月至2014年6月间担任中共广州市委书记。
description.en: Wan Qingliang served as the Party Secretary of Guangzhou from December 2011 to June 2014.
